message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $75 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.
